boost/python/ndarray/tables/Layout.hpp

00004 #include <boost/numpy.hpp>
00005 #include <boost/python/ndarray.hpp>
00006 #include <ndarray/tables.hpp>

00008 namespace ndarray { namespace tables {
00009 
00010 struct LayoutToNumpyType {
00011 
00012     template <typename T>
00013     void operator()(Field<T,0> const & field) const {
00014         dict[field.name] = boost::python::make_tuple(
00015             boost::numpy::dtype::get_builtin<T>(),
00016             field.offset
00017         );
00018     }
00019 
00020     template <typename T, int N>
00021     void operator()(Field<T,N> const & field) const {
00022         dict[field.name] = boost::python::make_tuple(
00023             boost::python::make_tuple(
00024                 boost::numpy::dtype::get_builtin<T>(),
00025                 boost::python::object(field.shape)
00026             ),
00027             field.offset
00028         );
00029     }
00030     
00031     mutable boost::python::dict dict;
00032 };
00033 
00034 struct NumpyTypeToLayout {
00035 
00036     template <typename T>
00037     void operator()(Field<T,0> & field) const {
00038         field.name = boost::python::extract<std::string>(pyNames[n]);
00039         boost::python::tuple s = boost::python::extract<boost::python::tuple>(pyFields[field.name]);
00040         field.offset = boost::python::extract<int>(s[1]);
00041         boost::numpy::dtype pyElement 
00042             = boost::python::extract<boost::numpy::dtype>(s[0]);
00043         if (pyElement != boost::numpy::dtype::get_builtin<T>()) {
00044             PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "Type mismatch encountered in field %s.", field.name.c_str());
00045             boost::python::throw_error_already_set();
00046         }
00047         ++n;
00048     }
00049 
00050     template <typename T, int N>
00051     void operator()(Field<T,N> & field) const {
00052         field.name = boost::python::extract<std::string>(pyNames[n]);
00053         boost::python::tuple s1 = boost::python::extract<boost::python::tuple>(pyFields[field.name]);
00054         boost::python::tuple s2 = boost::python::extract<boost::python::tuple>(s1[0].attr("subdtype"));
00055         field.offset = boost::python::extract<int>(s1[1]);
00056         field.shape = boost::python::extract< Vector<int,N> >(s2[1]);
00057         boost::numpy::dtype pyElement 
00058             = boost::python::extract<boost::numpy::dtype>(s2[0]);
00059         if (pyElement != boost::numpy::dtype::get_builtin<T>()) {
00060             PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "Type mismatch encountered in field %s.", field.name.c_str());
00061             boost::python::throw_error_already_set();
00062         }
00063         ++n;
00064     }
00065 
00066     NumpyTypeToLayout(boost::numpy::dtype const & input) :
00067         n(0), pyNames(input.attr("names")), pyFields(input.attr("fields"))
00068     {}
00069 
00070     mutable int n;
00071     boost::python::object pyNames;
00072     boost::python::object pyFields;
00073 };
00074 
00075 template <typename T>
00076 boost::numpy::dtype makeNumpyType(Layout<T> const & layout) {
00077     LayoutToNumpyType function;
00078     boost::fusion::for_each(layout.getSequence(), function);
00079     return boost::numpy::dtype(function.dict, false);
00080 }
00081 
00082 template <typename T>
00083 void fillLayout(boost::numpy::dtype const & input, Layout<T> & layout) {
00084     NumpyTypeToLayout function(input);
00085     boost::fusion::for_each(layout.getSequence(), function);
00086 }
00087 
00088 }} // namespace ndarray::tables

00091 namespace boost { namespace python {
00092 
00093 template <typename T>
00094 struct to_python_value< ndarray::tables::Layout<T> const & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00095     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::tables::Layout<T> const & x) const {
00096         ndarray::tables::Layout<T> normal_layout(x);
00097         normal_layout.normalize();
00098         numpy::dtype dtype = ndarray::tables::makeNumpyType(normal_layout);
00099         Py_INCREF(dtype.ptr());
00100         return dtype.ptr();
00101     }
00102     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00103         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::dtype>::get_pytype();
00104     }
00105 };
00106 
00107 template <typename T>
00108 struct to_python_value< ndarray::tables::Layout<T> & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00109     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::tables::Layout<T> & x) const {
00110         return to_python_value< ndarray::tables::Layout<T> const & >()(x);
00111     }
00112     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00113         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::dtype>::get_pytype();
00114     }
00115 };

00117 namespace converter {
00118 
00119 template <typename T>
00120 struct arg_to_python< ndarray::tables::Layout<T> > : public handle<> {
00121     inline arg_to_python(ndarray::tables::Layout<T> const & v) :
00122         handle<>(to_python_value<ndarray::tables::Layout<T> const &>()(v)) {}
00123 };
00124 
00125 template <typename T>
00126 struct arg_rvalue_from_python< ndarray::tables::Layout<T> const & > {
00127     typedef ndarray::tables::Layout<T> result_type;
00128 
00129     arg_rvalue_from_python(PyObject * p) : arg(python::detail::borrowed_reference(p)) {}
00130 
00131     bool convertible() const {
00132         try {
00133             numpy::dtype dtype = extract<numpy::dtype>(arg);
00134             if (dtype.attr("fields") == object()) return false;
00135         } catch (error_already_set) {
00136             handle_exception();
00137             PyErr_Clear();
00138             return false;
00139         }
00140         return true;
00141     }
00142 
00143     result_type operator()() const {
00144         numpy::dtype dtype = extract<numpy::dtype>(arg);
00145         ndarray::tables::Layout<T> layout;
00146         ndarray::tables::fillLayout(dtype, layout);
00147         return layout;
00148     }
00149 
00150     mutable object arg;
00151 };
00152 
00153 template <typename T>
00154 struct extract_rvalue< ndarray::tables::Layout<T> > : private noncopyable {
00155     typedef ndarray::tables::Layout<T> result_type;
00156 
00157     extract_rvalue(PyObject * x) : m_converter(x) {}
00158 
00159     bool check() const { return m_converter.convertible(); }
00160     
00161     result_type operator()() const { return m_converter(); }
00162 
00163 private:
00164     arg_rvalue_from_python< result_type const & > m_converter;
00165 };
